entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
